transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Aapko WhatsApp pe maine bhej diya, mil gaya aapko?
Customer: Mil gaya hai.
Executive: Isko wahin se jo aapko link bheja hai na, usi pe click kijiye.
Customer: Main karta hu thodi der.
Executive: Kitne der mein mujhe iska details share kar dijiyega?
Customer: Main karta hu, karta hu, payment karta hu, shaam tak karta hu.
Executive: Shaam tak kitne baje tak mujhe isko validate karna padega? Jo bhi final tha maine final karke diya hai.
Customer: 7:00 baje tak.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: 7:00 baje tak sir.
Executive: 7:00 baje, kyun usse pehle nahi ho sakta sir ji? 6:00 baje mera office band ho jata hai.
Customer: Main karta hu 7:00 baje tak karta hu.
Executive: Aaj hi ko final process kara dijiyega, theek hai na? Fir se main aapko call karta hu. Theek hai na? Online payment karte hain, kaise karte hain?
Customer: Online karta hu.
Executive: Online kar dijiyega na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kaun sa card rakhte hain aap?
Customer: UPI karta hu.
Executive: Kaun sa bank hai?
Customer: UPI karta hu, UPI.
Executive: UPI karte hain aap?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir ji, main aapko call karta hu. Thoda sa koshish kijiye sir ki 6:00 baje se pehle agar ho jaye toh jyada achha rahega. Main ek baar call karke check karta hu aapko. Theek hai na? Okay.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs time till 7:00 PM for payment.

- Executive wants payment before 6:00 PM.



Resolution:

- Executive will call again to check on payment.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, online payment, upi, validation
